title: Airship City
description: Life is hard for Joseph Samson. His father was killed in an airship accident, and heâ€™s had to leave his school and go to work to support himself and his mother. His dream of becoming a pilot dashed, it seems he will always be stuck on the ground.Then, on the day that Aeropolis comes to London, fate smiles on Joseph, and he finds himself aboard the famous airship city. But in escaping from his mundane life below, he entangles himself in a dangerous web of intrigue.Trying to find out the truth behind the accident which killed his father could cost him his own life.An alternative-history adventure suitable for readers of all ages.
author: Stephen   West
